languages.text:
Полное собрание технолитаний — знак благодарности от Эксплораторов, получивших право опекать Горнило на Фолстоуне. Техножрецы неустанно читают их над корабельными орудиями.
~// +3% к шансу критического попадания и +3% к критическому {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урону{/g} всех корабельных орудий (кроме торпед)

This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}
languages.original_text:
Полное собрание технолитаний — знак благодарности от Эксплораторов, получивших право опекать Горнило на Фолстоуне. Техножрецы неустанно читают их над корабельными орудиями.
~// +3% к шансу критического попадания и +3% к критическому {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урону{/g} всех корабельных орудий (кроме торпед)

traits.locale_text: This complete collection of Tech-Litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone.
This complete collection of Tech-Litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone.

This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical damage

This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

languages.text:
Ce recueil complet de technolitanies est un gage de gratitude offert par les Explorators pour remercier de leur avoir confié le Creuset de Rochepeste. Les technoprêtres embarqués en font profiter l'arsenal du vaisseau spatial.
~// Les chances de coup critique et les {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} critiques de toutes les armes du vaisseau (hormis les torpilles) sont augmentés de +3 %.
languages.original_text:
This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: Ce recueil complet de technolitanies est un gage de gratitude offert {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} par les Explorators pour {mf|le|la} remercier de leur avoir confié le Creuset de Rochepeste.

languages.text:
この技術的リタニアの完全なコレクションは、ファウルストーンの坩堝を任される権利を与えてくれた自由開拓者に対するエクスプロレイターからの感謝の印であり、船の技術司祭たちは、船の武器にこの儀式を捧げるのであった。
~//ヴォイドシップの武器（魚雷を除く）のクリティカル命中率とクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の両方が+3%上昇します
languages.original_text:
This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: この技術的リタニアの完全なコレクションは、ファウルストーンの坩堝を任される権利を与えてくれた自由開拓者に対するエクスプロレイターからの感謝の印である。

この技術的リタニアの完全なコレクションは、ファウルストーンの坩堝を任される権利を与えてくれた自由開拓者に対するエクスプロレイターからの感謝の印であり、船の技術司祭たちは、船の武器にこの儀式を捧げるのであった。
~//ヴォイドシップの武器（魚雷を除く）のクリティカル命中率とクリティカルダメージの両方が+3%上昇します

languages.text:
开拓者向行商浪人献上了完整的技术祷词合集，感谢行商浪人授予其掌管荒寂岩地熔炉的权力。旗舰上所有的技术神甫都会恭恭敬敬地朗诵这些祷文，为舰船的武器赐予祝福。
~//旗舰所有武器（除了鱼雷之外）暴击率提高3%，暴击{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高3%。
languages.original_text:
This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: 开拓者向行商浪人献上了完整的技术祷词合集，以感谢行商浪人授予其掌管荒寂岩地熔炉的权力。

开拓者向行商浪人献上了完整的技术祷词合集，感谢行商浪人授予其掌管荒寂岩地熔炉的权力。旗舰上所有的技术神甫都会恭恭敬敬地朗诵这些祷文，为舰船的武器赐予祝福。
~// 旗舰所有武器（除了鱼雷之外）暴击率提高3%，暴击伤害提高3%。

languages.text:
Esta colección completa de tecnoletanías es una muestra de gratitud de los Exploradores {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente por concederles el derecho a hacerse cargo del crisol en Rocainmunda. Los tecnosacerdotes de la nave recitan las letanías sobre las armas de la nave.
~// Todas las armas de la nave del vacío (excepto torpedos) ganan +3 % a la probabilidad de impacto crítico y +3 % al {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} crítico.
languages.original_text:
This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: Esta colección completa de tecnoletanías es una muestra de gratitud de los Exploradores {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente por concederles el derecho a hacerse cargo del crisol en Rocainmunda.

languages.text:
Diese vollständige Sammlung von Tech-Litaneien wurde {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von den Exploratoren als Zeichen ihrer Dankbarkeit überreicht – weil sie das Recht erhalten haben, auf Foulstone den Tiegel zu beaufsichtigen. Die Techpriester des Schiffs rezitieren diese Litaneien pflichtgemäß über den Schiffswaffen.
// Alle Raumschiffwaffen (außer Torpedos) erhalten +3 % kritische Trefferchance und +3 kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}
languages.original_text:
This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}

traits.locale_text: Diese vollständige Sammlung von Tech-Litaneien wurde {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von den Exploratoren als Zeichen ihrer Dankbarkeit überreicht — weil sie das Recht erhalten hat, auf Foulstone den Tiegel zu beaufsichtigen.

Diese vollständige Sammlung von Tech-Litaneien wurde {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von den Exploratoren als Zeichen ihrer Dankbarkeit überreicht – weil sie das Recht erhalten haben, auf Foulstone den Tiegel zu beaufsichtigen. Die Techpriester des Schiffs rezitieren diese Litaneien pflichtgemäß über den Schiffswaffen.
// Alle Raumschiffwaffen (außer Torpedos) erhalten +3 % kritische Trefferchance und +3 kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}

languages.text:
Tekno ilahilerin bu eksiksiz derlemesi, Menfurtaş'taki Pota'nın kontrolünü kendilerine vermesinden dolayı Keşiftörlerin Hür Tacir'e duyduğu şükranın bir göstergesidir. Geminin Tekno Rahipleri, bu ilahileri geminin silahları üzerinde yılmaz bir görev bilinciyle okumaktadırlar.
~// Torpidolar hariç tüm uçsuz gemisi silahları, kritik vuruş olasılıklarına +%3 ve verecekleri kritik {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasara{/g} +%3 kazanır.
languages.original_text:
This complete collection of tech-litanies is a token of gratitude from the Explorators to the Rogue Trader for giving them the right to take charge of the Crucible on Foulstone. The ship's Tech-Priests dutifully recite these litanies over the ship's weapons.
~// All voidship weapons (except torpedoes) gain +3% to critical hit chance and +3% to critical {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}
